<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="NCR Back Office (NBO)">482143af4f838f001674b47f0210c77f</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', '3b6c84240f874300303691dbe1050e16'); //NCR Back Office (NBO)
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 16:56:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2a4847e34fc38f001674b47f0210c73f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2a4847e34fc38f001674b47f0210c73f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 18:47:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_0b5df4270f97cf00303691dbe1050eb5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Aloha Online Ordering">ba4db4270f97cf00303691dbe1050ebc</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system and show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', '7dfb88e00f874300303691dbe1050eba'); //Aloha Online Ordering
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-02 17:05:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>0b5df4270f97cf00303691dbe1050eb5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system and show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0b5df4270f97cf00303691dbe1050eb5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-02 17:05:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Command Center (CMC)">fb7a7c630f97cf00303691dbe1050eb2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system and show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', '3eab44ec0f474300303691dbe1050ea6'); //Aloha CMC
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-02 16:55:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>621b38a30f97cf00303691dbe1050ec7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system and show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_621b38a30f97cf00303691dbe1050ec7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-02 16:55:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_fa614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7f7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e87</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set filter for u_access_name</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
	//Reset Slush bucket after 
	var leftBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_0');  
    var rightBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_1');   
	var selectedOptions = rightBucket.options;
 
	//Get an array of all option IDs to move
	var selectedIDs = [];
	var index = 0;
	for(var i = 0; i < selectedOptions.length; i++){
		selectedIDs[index] = i;
		index++;
	}
	moveSelectedOptions(selectedIDs, rightBucket, leftBucket, '--None--');

	
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
		myListCollector.refresh();
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 16:26:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fa614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set filter for u_access_name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fa614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 16:48:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR NCR Back Office">2a6107af4f838f001674b47f0210c7da</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:2107cb430f8b4700303691dbe1050e47</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Show on behalf if self is false</name><order>205</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'self'){
	 g_form.setValue('u_opened_for', g_user.userID);
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	 //g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', false);
 }   else if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'on_behalf'){
	 g_form.clearValue('u_opened_for');
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', true);
	 g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', true);
 }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 16:26:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>36614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show on behalf if self is false</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_36614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 16:26:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Copy of SAR ServiceNow">2a6107af4f838f001674b47f0210c7da</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.target_name: Show on behalf if self is false

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_777ffecb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e50
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7f7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e87</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set filter for u_access_name</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
	//Reset Slush bucket after 
	var leftBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_0');  
    var rightBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_1');   
	var selectedOptions = rightBucket.options;
 
	//Get an array of all option IDs to move
	var selectedIDs = [];
	var index = 0;
	for(var i = 0; i < selectedOptions.length; i++){
		selectedIDs[index] = i;
		index++;
	}
	moveSelectedOptions(selectedIDs, rightBucket, leftBucket, '--None--');

	
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
		myListCollector.refresh();
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SarDBRoleLookup</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SarDBRoleLookup</name><script><![CDATA[function SarDBRoleLookup(){
	var speclist= '';
	var u_access_name = current.variable_pool.u_access_name;
	gs.log('access_name '+u_access_name);

	var catlist = new GlideRecord('u_sar_database_role');
	catlist.addQuery('u_server',u_access_name);
	catlist.orderByDesc('u_access_name');
	catlist.query();
	

	
	
	while(catlist.next()) {
		//build a comma separated string of users
		speclist += (catlist.sys_id + ',');
	}
	// return a list of user id's for the selected company
	gs.log('speclist '+speclist);
	return 'sys_idIN' + speclist;	
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 14:20:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b2357f2a4f3943801674b47f0210c7f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SarDBRoleLookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b2357f2a4f3943801674b47f0210c7f6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 14:20:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c6a09f240f2acf00303691dbe1050edf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Add Envs</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name');
	
   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:2107cb430f8b4700303691dbe1050e47</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Show opened for if self is false</name><order>205</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'self'){
	 g_form.setValue('u_opened_for', g_user.userID);
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	 //g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', false);
 }   else if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'on_behalf'){
	 g_form.clearValue('u_opened_for');
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', true);
	 g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', true);
 }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>678c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show opened for if self is false</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_678c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Copy of SAR Generic">1f8c56fb4f9bc7401674b47f0210c740</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_5d7ef4670f97cf00303691dbe1050eb3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shared Drives">2b6eb4670f97cf00303691dbe1050e1e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system and show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', 'be0ddc680f62cf00303691dbe1050ecc'); //Shared Drives
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-02 17:10:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5d7ef4670f97cf00303691dbe1050eb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system and show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5d7ef4670f97cf00303691dbe1050eb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-02 17:39:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_e10144bb4f478f001674b47f0210c785
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Management Reporter">7af08cbb4f478f001674b47f0210c753</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system & show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', 'ead824200fa2cf00303691dbe1050e3d'); //Management Reporter
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 21:04:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e10144bb4f478f001674b47f0210c785</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system & show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e10144bb4f478f001674b47f0210c785</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:04:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="SAR Request Form">7b933a510f44c300303691dbe1050e76</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Manipulate Slushbucket Size</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(){
     var varName = 'company';
     var height = '100'; //Optional
     var width = '250'; //Optional
     try{
         //Get the left and right bucket input elements
         var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
         var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
         
         //If the element exists
         if(leftBucket){
             //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
             if(height){
                 leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                 rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
             }
             
             if(width){
                 //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                 leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                 rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                 //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                 leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
             }
             
             //Fix the expanding item preview issue
             $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
         }
     }catch(e){}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nikolaus01</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-28 14:05:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manipulate Slushbucket Size</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nikolaus01</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-28 14:05:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
trueon_desktopfalsefalse01970-01-03 00:00:00

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_448ffecb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7f7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e87</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Add Envs</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name');
	
   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}
	

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-20 03:00:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>448ffecb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add Envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_448ffecb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-20 03:14:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR ServiceNow">7b7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e7e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_8ec644334f878f001674b47f0210c70a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:37c30c7f4f478f001674b47f0210c74c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Show opened for if self is false</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'self'){
	 g_form.setValue('u_opened_for', g_user.userID);
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	 //g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', false);
 }   else if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'on_behalf'){
	 g_form.clearValue('u_opened_for');
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', true);
	 g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', true);
 }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 21:29:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8ec644334f878f001674b47f0210c70a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show opened for if self is false</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8ec644334f878f001674b47f0210c70a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:29:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Custom - GP">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</name><order>2</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	
    var varName = 'u_access_name';
    var height = '100'; //Optional
    var width = '250'; //Optional
    try{
        //Get the left and right bucket input elements
        var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
        var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
        
        //If the element exists
        if(leftBucket){
            //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
            if(height){
                leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
            }
            
            if(width){
                //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
            }
            
            //Fix the expanding item preview issue
            $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
        }
    }catch(e){}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2f8c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2f8c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Copy of SAR Generic">1f8c56fb4f9bc7401674b47f0210c740</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_71b830280fa2cf00303691dbe1050e39
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Role</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-17 02:15:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>71b830280fa2cf00303691dbe1050e39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Role</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_71b830280fa2cf00303691dbe1050e39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-17 02:15:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="System Access Request">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d9e9fc630f97cf00303691dbe1050e36
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Configuration Center (CFC)">1ab978af0f57cf00303691dbe1050e37</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system & show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', 'd6aa84ec0f474300303691dbe1050efd'); //Aloha CFC
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-02 16:50:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d9e9fc630f97cf00303691dbe1050e36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system & show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d9e9fc630f97cf00303691dbe1050e36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-02 16:50:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ReconNET">67ea4c334f878f001674b47f0210c7eb</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system & show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', 'd2fce7900f474300303691dbe1050e36'); //ReconNET
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 21:48:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>202b8cb34f878f001674b47f0210c79d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system & show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_202b8cb34f878f001674b47f0210c79d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:48:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-02 17:01:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c58c38e30f97cf00303691dbe1050e4b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system and show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c58c38e30f97cf00303691dbe1050e4b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-02 17:01:49</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_6695c7030f8b4700303691dbe1050ed1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7f7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e87</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Display envs based on system</name><order>3</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  
    var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-20 03:32:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>6695c7030f8b4700303691dbe1050ed1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display envs based on system</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6695c7030f8b4700303691dbe1050ed1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 18:45:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Generic">7b7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e7e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set filter for u_access_name</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
	//Reset Slush bucket after 
	var leftBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_0');  
    var rightBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_1');   
	var selectedOptions = rightBucket.options;
 
	//Get an array of all option IDs to move
	var selectedIDs = [];
	var index = 0;
	for(var i = 0; i < selectedOptions.length; i++){
		selectedIDs[index] = i;
		index++;
	}
	moveSelectedOptions(selectedIDs, rightBucket, leftBucket, '--None--');

	
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
		myListCollector.refresh();
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-17 20:00:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set filter for u_access_name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-19 20:45:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="System Access Request">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SarAccessLookup</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SarAccessLookup</name><script><![CDATA[function SarAccessLookup(){
	var speclist= '';
	//var u_system_name = current.variables.answer1;
	var u_system_name = current.variable_pool.u_system_name;
	//gs.log('system_name '+u_system_name);
	//g_form.getDisplayBox('u_sar_system_details').u_system_name;
	var catlist = new GlideRecord('u_sar_system_details');
	catlist.addQuery('u_system_name_2',u_system_name);
	catlist.orderByDesc('u_access_name');
	catlist.query();
	

	
	
	while(catlist.next()) {
		//build a comma separated string of users
		speclist += (catlist.sys_id + ',');
	}
	// return a list of user id's for the selected company
	//gs.log('speclist '+speclist);
	return 'sys_idIN' + speclist;	
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nikolaus01</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-17 18:45:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SarAccessLookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 14:17:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_eb49b95f4fc74f001674b47f0210c78c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</name><order>2</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	
    var varName = 'u_access_name';
    var height = '100'; //Optional
    var width = '250'; //Optional
    try{
        //Get the left and right bucket input elements
        var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
        var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
        
        //If the element exists
        if(leftBucket){
            //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
            if(height){
                leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
            }
            
            if(width){
                //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
            }
            
            //Fix the expanding item preview issue
            $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
        }
    }catch(e){}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-20 16:33:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>eb49b95f4fc74f001674b47f0210c78c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_eb49b95f4fc74f001674b47f0210c78c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 18:53:14</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Generic">7b7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e7e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_2b8c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:7f7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e87</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set filter for u_access_name</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
	//Reset Slush bucket after 
	var leftBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_0');  
    var rightBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_1');   
	var selectedOptions = rightBucket.options;
 
	//Get an array of all option IDs to move
	var selectedIDs = [];
	var index = 0;
	for(var i = 0; i < selectedOptions.length; i++){
		selectedIDs[index] = i;
		index++;
	}
	moveSelectedOptions(selectedIDs, rightBucket, leftBucket, '--None--');

	
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
		myListCollector.refresh();
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2b8c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set filter for u_access_name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2b8c563f4f9bc7401674b47f0210c7c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-03 18:39:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Copy of SAR Generic">1f8c56fb4f9bc7401674b47f0210c740</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_718da7af4f078f001674b47f0210c7c8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="T-STATS">df5d276f4f078f001674b47f0210c7dd</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system & show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', '365d10680f62cf00303691dbe1050e64'); //T-STATS
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 19:41:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>718da7af4f078f001674b47f0210c7c8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system & show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_718da7af4f078f001674b47f0210c7c8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 19:43:50</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d71b84a34fc00b001674b47f0210c70e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="SAR Request Form">7b933a510f44c300303691dbe1050e76</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:ce84b2910f44c300303691dbe1050e34</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Env by Access Name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
  
	var caller = g_form.getReference('u_access_name', doShowEnv);
  // var selectedSystem = g_form.getValue('answer1');// doAlert is our callback function
}
function doShowEnv(caller) { //reference is passed into callback as first arguments
	
	//g_form.clearOptions('environment_two');
	
  if (caller.u_prod == 'true'){
	 // g_form.addOption('environment_two','Prod','value1');
      g_form.setVisible('u_prod', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('u_prod', false);
		// g_form.removeOption('environment_two','prod_two');
	   } 
	
  if (caller.u_stage == 'true'){

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:2107cb430f8b4700303691dbe1050e47</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Show opened for if self is false</name><order>205</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'self'){
	 g_form.setValue('u_opened_for', g_user.userID);
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	 //g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', false);
 }   else if (g_form.getValue('u_self') == 'on_behalf'){
	 g_form.clearValue('u_opened_for');
	 g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', true);
	 g_form.setMandatory('u_opened_for', true);
 }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-20 03:56:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1d3bc7070f8b4700303691dbe1050eea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show opened for if self is false</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1d3bc7070f8b4700303691dbe1050eea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:29:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Generic">7b7f7acb0f4b4700303691dbe1050e7e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Great Plains">468144fb4f478f001674b47f0210c714</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set system & show envs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	g_form.setValue('u_system_name', 'fe3d10680f62cf00303691dbe1050e88'); //Great Plains
	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
	
	var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name', showEnvs);
	
	 function showEnvs(u_system_name){

   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 21:06:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>6c9188fb4f478f001674b47f0210c751</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system & show envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6c9188fb4f478f001674b47f0210c751</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:13:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_a94500ff4f478f001674b47f0210c708
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	g_form.setDisplay('u_opened_for', false);
	
	//Resize access slushbucket
    var varName = 'u_access_name';
    var height = '100'; //Optional
    var width = '250'; //Optional
    try{
        //Get the left and right bucket input elements
        var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
        var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
        
        //If the element exists
        if(leftBucket){
            //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
            if(height){
                leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
            }
            
            if(width){
                //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
            }
            
            //Fix the expanding item preview issue
            $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
        }
    }catch(e){}
	
	//Resize GP environments slushbucket
	var varName2 = 'u_environments';
    var height2 = '100'; //Optional
    var width2 = '250'; //Optional
    try{
        //Get the left and right bucket input elements
        var leftBucket2 = $(varName2 + '_select_0');
        var rightBucket2 = $(varName2 + '_select_1');
        
        //If the element exists
        if(leftBucket2){
            //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
            if(height2){
                leftBucket2.style.height = height2 + 'px';
                rightBucket2.style.height = height2 + 'px';
            }
            
            if(width2){
                //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                leftBucket2.style.width = width2 + 'px';
                rightBucket2.style.width = width2 + 'px';
                                //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                leftBucket2.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width2*2 + 100 + 'px';
            }
            
            //Fix the expanding item preview issue
            $(varName2 + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
        }
    }catch(e){}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 21:26:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a94500ff4f478f001674b47f0210c708</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Adjust slushbucket size/hide opened for</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a94500ff4f478f001674b47f0210c708</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 21:28:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Custom - GP">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_3a614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Adjust list collector size</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
    var varName = 'u_access_name';
    var height = '100'; //Optional
    var width = '250'; //Optional
    try{
        //Get the left and right bucket input elements
        var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
        var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
        
        //If the element exists
        if(leftBucket){
            //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
            if(height){
                leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
            }
            
            if(width){
                //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
            }
            
            //Fix the expanding item preview issue
            $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
        }
    }catch(e){}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 16:26:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3a614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Adjust list collector size</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3a614baf4f838f001674b47f0210c7d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 16:26:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Copy of SAR ServiceNow">2a6107af4f838f001674b47f0210c7da</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   //Set system name field equal to Record Producer name
	var sys = sc_cat_item_producer.name;

	g_form.setReadOnly('u_system_name', true);
	g_form.setDisplay('u_system_name', false);
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie05</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-12-21 17:12:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7f0b87674fc38f001674b47f0210c7be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set system name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7f0b87674fc38f001674b47f0210c7be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie05</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-21 17:14:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="SAR Set System Name">cd8a4fe34fc38f001674b47f0210c763</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
